wikipedia_page.main:
Louis Dominick Lynch (1904–5 August 1976) was an Irish nationalist politician and newspaper owner.
Born in Omagh, Lynch became managing director and owner of the Ulster Herald series of newspapers.From 1949 until 1957, Lynch served as a Nationalist Party member of the Senate of Northern Ireland.

link_mentions.page: List of members of the Senate of Northern Ireland

response: *Louis Lynch (1904–1976), Northern Irish Senator from 1949 to 1957
